feature1.explanation: Both texts use informal language with profanity and similar punctuation styles, including hyphens and quotation marks.

feature5.explanation: There are no apparent spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the alignment in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
